greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fourth column of triangular array in A296339.
comment: This was the first column of A296339 for which no simple formula was known (cf. A004483, A004482). (Since these are Grundy values for a certain game, there is a complicated recurrence involving the whole triangle.) The formula below matches the data, and is fairly short (but ugly).
formula: It appears that for n >= 8, a(n) = tersum(n,1) + 6 if n == 2 (mod 3), otherwise tersum(n,1) - 3.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 02 2018
